snippet.title: Lost Ember Release Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the new announcement video at https://youtu.be/kkYyTU7u6q0

►►► Wishlist now on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/563840/LOST_EMBER/

····················································································

Lost Ember finally has a release date! We're really happy and excited (and also a bit nervous) to finally be able to tell you that July 19th is the day you all should mark red in your calendars :)
And on top of that we're finally able to confirm that Lost Ember will be released on Switch as well (although that will probably take a bit longer)! 

Lost Ember lets you explore ancient ruins and forgotten memories as a wolf with the ability to possess any animal you meet to find out what happened to humankind and your trusted spirit companion in a past life.

····················································································

FOLLOW US ON:

• https://www.instagram.com/mooneyestudios/
• https://mooneyestudios.tumblr.com/

http://www.mooneyestudios.com/

#lostember #games #animals #nintendo #switch #ps4 #xboxone
